title: Standalone App
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has the link for Genie
custom_steps: WHEN a user access Genie Standalone app
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be on VOD Entry App
AND be able to Select a Genie instance

title: Standalone App - MLB Instances
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on VOD Entry App
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the select instance
AND selects MLB-PROD or MLB-DEV
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the MLB Genie instance

title: Standalone App - SVOD Instances
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on VOD Entry App
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the select instance
AND selects MLB-PROD or MLB-DEV
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the MLB Genie instance

title: Standalone App - MiLB Instance
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on VOD Entry App
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the select instance
AND selects MiLB-PROD or MiLB-DEV
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the MiLB Genie instance

title: Standalone App - OpProps (YES Instance)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on VOD Entry App
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the select instance
AND selects YES-PROD or YES-DEV
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the YES Genie instance

title: Standalone App - OpProps (USAB Instance)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on VOD Entry App
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the select instance
AND selects USAB-PROD or USAB-DEV
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the USAB Genie instance

title: Diamond Integration App - Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in Diamond
AND searches for an asset tag (cms - CMS_STATES)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the asset
AND clicks on Asset > Edit CMS Data
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have option to select
MLB
MiLB
OpProps (USAB+YES->Forge)
OpProps (SNY->Homebase)

title: Diamond Integration App - Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an asset selected
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects an instance from the Asset > Edit CMS Data option
custom_expected:
THEN the Genie app will open
AND the form will be populated with the data from the asset

Tabs - VOD Entry Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the MLB Genie
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the VOD Entry From
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the form

title: Tabs - Advanced
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the MLB Genie
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the VOD Entry From
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the options for
Submission Text
Taxonomy

title: Search by Slug - Found
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is MLB Genie
AND clicks on Get Video to Overwrite
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters the slug of the video in Forge
AND clicks on Ok
custom_expected: THEN the CMS Asset form will open for that video slug

title: Search by Slug - Not Found
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is MLB Genie
AND clicks on Get Video to Overwrite
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters the slug of the video not in Forge
AND clicks on Ok
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an error message - Couldn't access video at slug: <slug>

title: Listing Availability - Public
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Public for Listing Availability
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the List Availability will be set to Public in Forge

title: Listing Availability - Unlisted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Unlisted for Listing Availability
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected:
THEN the List Availability will be set to Unlisted in Forge
AND it's available to use in pages/articles/on site
AND it's "hidden from search" & not available through search results in the DAPI

title: Lang - EN
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects EN for LANG
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the Video Asset will be set to EN in Forge

title: Lang - ES
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects ES for LANG
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the Video Asset will be set to ES in Forge

title: Forge - Prod
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects PROD for Forge
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the Video Asset will be set to Prod Forge

title: Forge - QA
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects QA for Forge
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the Video Asset will be set to QA Forge

title: Metadata - Blurb
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Metadata section
AND types in the Blurb
custom_expected: THEN the limit is 53 characters

title: Metadata - Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Metadata section
AND types in the Title
custom_expected: THEN the limit is 33 characters

title: Metadata - Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Metadata section
AND types in the Description
custom_expected: THEN the limit is 140 characters

title: Metadata - Special Characters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Metadata section
AND types in the special characters (&) and/or Spanish characters (Acuña) and/or emoji (https://emojipedia.org/)
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the asset will display the characters in Forge and Genie

title: Internal Notes
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user types in the Internal Notes
custom_expected:
THEN there is no limit on characters
AND the Internal Note will show in Forge and Genie

title: Tags - Date Picker
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into the Date
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see a Date Picker
AND selecting a date should show as MM/dd/YYYY

title: Tags - Games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a date from Date picker
AND clicks on the Select a game dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the games for that date
AND the user should see <AWAY Team Abbr> at <HOME Team Abbr> H:MM AM/PM

Example - WSH at HOU 1:05PM

title: Tags - Teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into Teams
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see all MLB teams
AND each team will display the following
logo
abbreviation
name
team id

title: Tags - Players - Active
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a year
AND clicks on Active
AND types in first few letters
custom_expected:
THEN active player(s) from that year are displayed
AND the following displayed
Headshot
Full Name
Player Id

title: Tags - Players - Free Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a year
AND clicks on Free Agents
AND types in first few letters

https://www.mlb.com/hot-stove or http://www.espn.com/mlb/freeagents
custom_expected:
THEN free agents player(s) from that year are displayed
AND the following displayed
Headshot
Full Name
Player Id

title: Tags - Players - Historic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a year
AND clicks on Historic
AND types in first few letters

http://lookup-service-prod.mlb.com/lookup/json/named.search_player_all.bam?active_sw=%27N%27&name_part=%27je%25%27

Swap out the text for je with a player in the name_parts
custom_expected:
THEN Historic player(s) from that year are displayed
AND the following displayed
Headshot
Full Name
Player Id

title: Tags - Keywords
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects Keyword
custom_expected: THEN all of the keywords will be displayed

title: Tags - Keywords - Folder Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks the Folder
AND selects a Folder filter
AND types in text
custom_expected: THEN all of the keywords for that folder will be displayed

title: Tags - Keywords - Subfolder Filter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
AND selects a Folder filter
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks the Subfolder
AND selects a Subfolder filter
AND types in text
custom_expected: THEN all of the keywords for that folder and subfolder will be displayed

title: Tags - Remove Tag(s)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a video asset with tags
AND clicks on the X next to the tag
custom_expected: THEN the tag will be removed

title: Thumbnail - Add PNG
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on a PNG file
OR drags a PNG file to the Thumbnail section
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will be displayed in the Thumbnail section
AND after a publish, will be displayed in Forge and Genie

title: Thumbnail - Add JPG
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on a JPG file
OR drags a JPG file to the Thumbnail section
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will be displayed in the Thumbnail section
AND after a publish, will be displayed in Forge and Genie

title: Thumbnail - Unsupported File
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on an unsupported file format
OR drags an unsupported file format to the Thumbnail section
custom_expected: THEN the file will not be displayed in the thumbnail section

title: Thumbnail - Remove File
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a video asset with a thumbnail
AND clicks on the X next to the thumbnail
custom_expected: THEN the thumbnail will be removed from the video asset

title: Closed Caption File - Add VTT
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on a VTT file
OR drags a VTT file to the Closed Caption File section
custom_expected:
THEN the VTT will be displayed in the Thumbnail section
AND after a publish, will be displayed in Forge and Genie

title: Closed Caption File - Unsupported File
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on an unsupported file format
OR drags an unsupported file format to the Closed Caption File section
custom_expected: THEN the file will not be displayed in the Closed Caption File section

title: Closed Caption File - Remove VTT
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a video asset with a closed caption file (VTT)
AND clicks on the X next to the closed caption file
custom_expected: THEN the closed caption file will be removed from the video asset

title: Save and Publish - Publish button  (Diamond Integrated App)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has accessed a video asset through Diamond
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens Genie from Diamond for that asset
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a buttons in the Save/Publish section for
Save Diamond - save to asset
Publish to MLB - publish to Forge

title: Save and Publish - Publish button  (Standalone App)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has accessed a video asset through Genie Standalone App
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens Genie for that asset
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a button in the Save/Publish section for
Publish to MLB - publish to Forge

title: Publish Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has all required fields entered
AND clicks on Publish MLB
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the current status in Publish Status 
- Sending to Forge...
- Forge Send Success.
- Syndication Email Sent.

title: Publish Status - Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has successfully published a video asset
AND a user is setup to receive emails
custom_steps: WHEN the user sees Syndication Email Sent in the Publish Status Section
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see an email with text for that video asset
AND the email will include the metadata

title: Publish Links - Success
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN a user publishes a new asset to Forge
OR opens an existing asset from Forge
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the link to the asset in Forge in Publish Links

title: Publish Links - Success with error
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN a user publishes a new asset to Forge
AND one of the tags does not process
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the link to the item in Forge
AND see the confirmation of the published asset
AND the error for the publish of the tag that does not process

title: Advanced tab - Submission Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Advanced
AND clicks on Submission text
custom_expected: THEN the user will see JSON of the asset

title: Advanced Tab - Taxonomy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Taxonomy
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the load taxonomy in JSON format
AND the user will see folder, subfolder, value, display in the reponse

title: Advanced Tab - Taxonomy - Ingest taxonomy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Taxonomy
AND clicks on Ingest taxonomy
custom_expected: THEN the user will see Taxonomy Ingested. message

title: Advanced Tab - Taxonomy - Save taxonomy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Taxonomy
AND clicks on Save taxonomy
custom_expected: THEN the user will see <path> message

custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the VOD Entry From
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the form

title: Metadata - Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Metadata section
AND types in the Description
custom_expected: THEN the limit is 140 characters

title: Metadata - Special Characters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Metadata section
AND types in the special characters (&) and/or Spanish characters (Acuña) and/or emoji (https://emojipedia.org/)
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the asset will display the characters in Forge and Genie

title: Internal Notes
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user types in the Internal Notes
custom_expected:
THEN there is no limit on characters
AND the Internal Note will show in Forge and Genie

title: Tags - Year Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into the Year filter
custom_expected:
THEN a popover appears for the decade
AND a user can choose a year

title: Tags - Year Filter - Requirement
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks into the Year filter
AND deletes the year
AND clicks into Teams
AND types a few letters
custom_expected:
THEN no data is displayed since Year is required

*MiLB teams change Affiliation and/or Location and/or Names year by year

title: Tags - Level Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into Level filter
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a dropdown with all the filters

Triple-A
Double-A
Class A Advanced
Class A
Class A Short Season
Rookie
Rookie Advanced

title: Tags - League Filter - All
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into League filter
custom_expected: THEN the user will see all of the leagues

title: Tags - League Filter - Filtered by Level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
AND selects a Level from the Level filter
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into League filter
custom_expected: THEN the user will see all of the leagues for that level

title: Tags - Date Picker
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks into the Date
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see a Date Picker
AND selecting a date should show as MM/dd/YYYY

title: Tags - Games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a date from Date picker
AND clicks on the Select a game dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the games for that date
AND the user should see <AWAY Team Name> at <HOME Team Name> M/DD/YY H:MM AM/PM

Example - Columbus at Lousiville 7/10/20 7:00PM

title: Tags - Teams
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user chooses a year
AND clicks into Teams
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see all MiLB teams for that year
AND each team will display the following
logo
abbreviation
name
team id

title: Tags - Teams by Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user chooses a year
AND clicks a Level filter
AND clicks a League filter
AND clicks into Teams
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see all MiLB teams for that year
AND Level
AND League
AND each team will display the following
logo
abbreviation
name
team id

title: Team Tag w/ Forge Auth - One Team
custom_preconds: Open an item in MiLB Genie
custom_steps:
Add a team to Team Tags Section
AND 
Publish
custom_expected:
After publish, check Forge for
Video Auth Group - All
Image Auth Group - Team tagged in Genie

title: Team Tag w/ Forge Auth  - Two Teams
custom_preconds: Open an item in MiLB Genie
custom_steps:
Add 2 teams to Team Tags Section
AND
Publish
custom_expected:
After publish, check Forge for
Video Auth Group - All
Image Auth Group - MiLB

title: Team Tag w/ Forge Auth  - No Teams
custom_preconds: Open an item in MiLB Genie
custom_steps:
Do not add a Team to the Teams Tags Section
AND
Publish
custom_expected:
After publish, check Forge for
Video Auth Group - All
Image Auth Group - MiLB

custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a year
AND selects a team
AND types in first few letters
custom_expected:
THEN active player(s) from that year are displayed
AND the following displayed
Headshot
Full Name
Player Id

title: Tags - Keywords
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects Keyword
custom_expected: THEN all of the keywords will be displayed

title: Tags - Keywords - Folder Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks the Folder
AND selects a Folder filter
AND types in text
custom_expected: THEN all of the keywords for that folder will be displayed

title: Tags - Keywords - Subfolder Filter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
AND selects a Folder filter
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks the Subfolder
AND selects a Subfolder filter
AND types in text
custom_expected: THEN all of the keywords for that folder and subfolder will be displayed

title: Tags - Remove Tag(s)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a video asset with tags
AND clicks on the X next to the tag
custom_expected: THEN the tag will be removed

title: Thumbnail - Add PNG
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on a PNG file
OR drags a PNG file to the Thumbnail section
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will be displayed in the Thumbnail section
AND after a publish, will be displayed in Forge and Genie

title: Thumbnail - Add JPG
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on a JPG file
OR drags a JPG file to the Thumbnail section
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will be displayed in the Thumbnail section
AND after a publish, will be displayed in Forge and Genie

title: Thumbnail - Unsupported File
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on an unsupported file format
OR drags an unsupported file format to the Thumbnail section
custom_expected: THEN the file will not be displayed in the thumbnail section

title: Thumbnail - Remove File
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a video asset with a thumbnail
AND clicks on the X next to the thumbnail
custom_expected: THEN the thumbnail will be removed from the video asset

title: Closed Caption File - Add VTT
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on a VTT file
OR drags a VTT file to the Closed Caption File section
custom_expected:
THEN the VTT will be displayed in the Thumbnail section
AND after a publish, will be displayed in Forge and Genie

title: Closed Caption File - Unsupported File
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Choose a File
AND clicks on an unsupported file format
OR drags an unsupported file format to the Closed Caption File section
custom_expected: THEN the file will not be displayed in the Closed Caption File section

title: Closed Caption File - Remove VTT
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Genie form
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a video asset with a closed caption file (VTT)
AND clicks on the X next to the closed caption file
custom_expected: THEN the closed caption file will be removed from the video asset

title: Save and Publish - Publish button  (Diamond Integrated App)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has accessed a video asset through Diamond
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens Genie from Diamond for that asset
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a buttons in the Save/Publish section for
Save Diamond - save to asset
Publish to MiLB - publish to Forge

title: Save and Publish - Publish button  (Standalone App)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has accessed a video asset through Genie Standalone App
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens Genie for that asset
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a button in the Save/Publish section for
Publish to MiLB - publish to Forge

title: Publish Status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has all required fields entered
AND clicks on Publish MiLB
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the current status in Publish Status 
- Sending to Forge...
- Forge Send Success.
- Syndication Email Sent.

title: Publish Status - Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has successfully published a video asset
AND a user is setup to receive emails
custom_steps: WHEN the user sees Syndication Email Sent in the Publish Status Section
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see an email with text for that video asset
AND the email will include the metadata

title: Publish Links - Success
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN a user publishes a new asset to Forge
OR opens an existing asset from Forge
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the link to the asset in Forge in Publish Links

title: Publish Links - Success with error
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN a user publishes a new asset to Forge
AND one of the tags does not process
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the link to the item in Forge
AND see the confirmation of the published asset
AND the error for the publish of the tag that does not process

title: Advanced tab - Submission Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Advanced
AND clicks on Submission text
custom_expected: THEN the user will see JSON of the asset

title: Advanced Tab - Taxonomy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Taxonomy
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the load taxonomy in JSON format
AND the user will see folder, subfolder, value, display in the reponse

title: Advanced Tab - Taxonomy - Ingest taxonomy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Taxonomy
AND clicks on Ingest taxonomy
custom_expected: THEN the user will see Taxonomy Ingested. message

title: Advanced Tab - Taxonomy - Save taxonomy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
When a user updates a video asset in Genie
AND publishes the asset
AND clicks on Taxonomy
AND clicks on Save taxonomy
custom_expected: THEN the user will see <path> message

title: Tabs - VOD Entry Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the OpProps YES Genie
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the VOD Entry From
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the form

title: Tabs - Advanced
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the OpProps YES Genie
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the VOD Entry From
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the options for
Submission Text
Taxonomy

title: Search by Slug - Found
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is MLB Genie
AND clicks on Get Video to Overwrite
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters the slug of the video in Forge
AND clicks on Ok
custom_expected: THEN the CMS Asset form will open for that video slug

title: Search by Slug - Not Found
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is YES Genie
AND clicks on Get Video to Overwrite
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters the slug of the video not in Forge
AND clicks on Ok
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an error message - Couldn't access video at slug: <slug>

title: Listing Availability - Public
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Public for Listing Availability
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected: THEN the List Availability will be set to Public in Forge

title: Listing Availability - Unlisted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a a video asset in Genie
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Unlisted for Listing Availability
AND the other required fields are filled out
AND Publishes the asset
custom_expected:
THEN the List Availability will be set to Unlisted in Forge
AND it's available to use in pages/articles/on site
AND it's "hidden from search" & not available through search results in the DAPI
